name: Korg Pitchblack Custom
details:
TunerThe 3D meter display is based on the acclaimed Pitchblack Pro, delivering a visually appealing tuner positioned on a higher design level than any previous pedal tuner, a stylish floor tuner that is also easy to read.
FEATURES
    3D visual meter display with a beautiful look delivers the practical advantage of improved visibility, and further dramatic illumination allows it to project a stunning image on a dark stage
    Large and easily visible note name indication using a large 7-segment LED Choose from four meter display modes depending on their style
    In addition to the standard meter mode, a strobe mode for visualizing minute pitch differences, a half-strobe mode, and a Regular B mode are also provided
    Ultra-precise tuning with +/-0.1 cent accuracy
    Same high detection precision as KORG™s professional-quality flagship models
    Battery: 9V battery (6F22) or AC adaptor 9V
    Battery life: approximately 15 hours (tuner continuously operating, A4 input)
    Dimensions (WxDxH): 67 mm x 113 mm x 45 mm / 2.64™™ x 4.45™™ x 1.77™™ Weight: 292 g / 0.64 lb. (including battery)
https://www.korg.com/nz/products/tuners/pitchblack_custom/
